name: json-delete
title: JSON DELETE Request
description: Execute a JSON HTTP DELETE request to any URL with configurable headers (defaults to JSON)

inputs.name: URL
inputs.description: The full URL to make the DELETE request to (e.g., https://api.example.com/v1/users/123)

inputs.name: Headers
inputs.description: Headers as a JSON string (e.g., {"Accept": "application/json", "Authorization": "Bearer token"})
